summary: Barbie stars as Blair, a kind-hearted girl who is chosen to attend Princess Charm School. In this magical place, she makes new friends and discovers that there's a princess in every girl!
cast: Diana Kaarina|Morwenna Banks|Nicole Oliver|Brittney Wilson|Ali Liebert|Shannon Chan-Kent|Madeleine Peters|Lee Tockar|Cathy Weseluck|Ellen Kennedy|Vincent Tong|Derek Waters|Brian Drummond|Tabitha St. Germain|Bethany Brown|Kelly Metzger|Kazumi Evans|Anna Cummer|Rachel Franco|Miranda Ram-Nolte
title: Barbie: Escuela de princesas
